name: Bambi's Nature Adventure
description:
Explore the world of Bambi with a fellow friend in this 2 player game!

Instructions for movement:

Bambi: Right and Left arrow keys to move,  Z key  or Up arrow key to jump

Hare: A and D keys to move, Space key to jump

Credits:

Karina- Art

Dane-Art

Arthur- Code, Art

Goran- Audio, Narrative Design

Jake- Code
